summary: It’s useless against the likes of the Green Goblin, Venom, or the Lizard, but if you’re trying to rescue a quarter that’s fallen...
caption: It’s useless against the likes of the Green Goblin, Venom, or the Lizard, but if you’re trying to rescue a quarter that’s fallen down a storm drain, you’ll be 25 cents richer with one of these strapped to your wrist! 🛠️

blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Miles Morales Requested by: Peter Parker Telephone networks have failed, the internet is...
caption:
Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Miles Morales
Requested by: Peter Parker

Telephone networks have failed, the internet is gone.  Modern communication seems to have come to an end.  What remains is radiowaves.  People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on.  Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

As he tuned the radio through the various channels, looking for news, Miles heard the end of a series of coordinates.  As the static cleared, a familiar voice sounded, a voice he had not heard in over a year –

This is Peter Parker broadcasting for Miles Morales. I know you are a survivor so you are out there somewhere. This is no city, but its got video games, good people, strong walls and plenty to eat. Also hot showers are a thing here so yeah try to find your way here kid. Us spiders need to stick together.

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

summary: so who’s going to bring up that, yes, Fury wants to recruit Peter for the new Avengers roster, but that he’s also probably...

blog.description: This is a backup blog to the sideblog MarvelPeril in case it gets deactivated. Note that there WON'T be any pictures of superheroes from live-action Marvel movies/TV Shows.

summary: Do you think it's possible that Peter can actually manipulate his body to fit through small (impossible) spaces but he just...
body:
Do you think it’s possible that Peter can actually manipulate his body to fit through small (impossible) spaces but he just never thought to test if he may have that ability?

I mean large spiders like; the huntsman can squeeze through the gaps in car doors/under house doors, and wolf spiders (another large species) live in small holes in the ground that are unbelievably disproportionate to their general size…

Just think that’d be a real cool spidey ability.

summary: Ok ok ok I'm sorry but I am not stooping that low to ship spider-ham and spider noir. So lil ol me decided to be that fuck again...
body:
Ok ok ok I’m sorry but I am not stooping that low to ship spider-ham and spider noir. So lil ol me decided to be that fuck again and make a character just to be gay for another character so atleast I have something to ship. Heres Alex!!

His relationship with Peter parker is your average dingles. He owns a company and is rich. How he met Peter is because he is one of the suspects in Peters case. So yadda yadda they gay!!
